holy shit i'm posting writing everyone take a picture, sanders sides, janus sanders, virgil sanders, hurt/comfort, holy shit i can't actually believe im doin this, but i was tired and mushy and i was like why not drabble, and then. huh, this isnt my usual style it's not anything coherent it's just some words, might taglist this later. might not, but it feels good to write these guys again, especially when it feels like it's just for me, altho u guys can enjoy it too of course dhgshjksls, anyway. yeah idk what these tags are about but coming back to an interest when uve changed just a bit is fun <3, u get to figure out what u liked and wanna keep with u, and i liked writing small dialogue shit like this so that's what i'm gonna do, at least this once. no promises on the rest of everything, but if u stuck around til the end of this post? or if u stuck around for way longer, i appreciate u a lot, and if i'm writing for anyone it's for u guys, thanks <3, averywrites
